company.name: The Sanders Law Firm LLC
company.description: Our goal at Sanders Law Firm is to help individuals and businesses who find themselves in the justice system. Alex and Zoe Sanders have a combined 76 years of experience in practicing law. They are father and daughter. They formed the firm to help people and businesses who find themselves involved in the justice system.

hero.headline: The Sanders Law Firm of South Carolina LLC
hero.subheadline: 76+ Years of law experience helping individuals and businesses in the justice system

about.headline: About Us
about.content: Alex and Zoe Sanders have a combined 76 years of experience in practicing law. They are father and daughter. They formed the firm to help people and businesses who find themselves involved in the justice system. Alex Sanders is a trial and appellate lawyer, and former state senator and college president. Zoe Sanders is a criminal, civil and regulatory lawyer with broad and in depth experience helping individuals and entities through complex issues.
